doc.title: On the Hot Seat with Mr Will Xavier on 938live
doc.text: This/DT is/VBZ my/PRP$ interview/NN with/IN the/DT indomitable/JJ Mr/NN X/NN who/WP put/VB me/PRP in/IN the/DT Hot/JJ Seat/NN on/IN 938live/NN ./. The/DT program/NN was/VBD first/JJ aired/NNS on/IN 10/CD May/NN 2011/NN at/IN 8.10/NNP pm/NNP ./. During/IN the/DT interview/NN we/PRP talked/VBD about/IN a/DT whole/JJ range/NN of/IN topics/NN from/IN how/WRB I/PRP became/VBD a/DT doctor/NN to/TO how/WRB I/PRP started/VBD the/DT food/NN blog/NN to/TO my/PRP$ philosophy/NN in/IN life/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ such/JJ a/DT privilege/NN to/TO be/VB interviewed/VBD by/IN Mr/NN X/NN as/IN I/PRP consider/VB him/PRP to/TO be/VB the/DT most/JJ distinctive/NN voice/NN of/IN Radio/NN today/NN !/. The/DT interview/NN was/VBD supposed/RB to/TO last/RB an/DT hour/NN but/CC we/PRP ended/VB up/VB talking/VBG for/IN more/JJR than/IN 2/CD hours/NNS on/IN a/DT whole/JJ range/NN of/IN other/JJ topics/NN ./. The/DT guy/NN really/RB is/VBZ very/RB interesting/JJ !/. The/DT Hot/NN Seat/NN airs/IN every/DT Tuesday/NN from/IN 7pm/NN to/TO 8pm/VB on/IN 938live/NN ./. Part/DT 1/CD :/: We/PRP talked/VB about/IN how/WRB and/CC why/WRB I/PRP went/VBD into/IN medicine/NN ./.
